N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 586.8 - Negative declarations

State Regulations
(a) If the
agency determines that an action is a type I action or unlisted action subject
to SEQR and will not have a significant effect upon the environment, it shall
prepare, maintain and file a notice of determination that an EIS will not be
prepared ("negative declaration") and written analyses and findings supporting
such determination in accordance with 6 NYCRR sections 617.7 and 617.12 and in
the file referred to in subdivision (b) of this section. (b) In order to afford the opportunity for
public notice and response, the agency will keep a separate file, updated
monthly, containing a brief description of determinations made pursuant to this
section, and will incorporate reference to the negative declaration in other
notices required by law in connection with the action. Notes
